title: Welcome to Open‑Economy Macroeconomics Solutions
text:
This site offers solutions for Open‑Economy Macroeconomics exercises including analytical derivations and code examples (Python and MATLAB).




Chapter 1 – Basics of Open Economy





Each page features an independent comment section. Feel free to share questions or feedback below each exercise, or browse [Discussions] for full threads.




Contributions welcome! Please open a pull request on GitHub.
